QueryDefinition.Query:
with idn as ( select sourceid, max(idn_indicator) idn_indicator from {sc}.patient where length(sourceid) = 5 group by sourceid )
SELECT distinct cast(right(e.sourceid, 4) as int) CARE_SITE_ID, e.sourceid CARE_SITE_SOURCE_VALUE, case when idn.idn_indicator = '1' then 'IDN' else NULL end as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.encounter e LEFT JOIN idn on e.sourceid = idn.sourceid
